00068         class NavigationGuidance {
00069             public:
00071                 enum Type {
00073                     Left    = 0,
00075                     Right   = 2,
00077                     Up      = 4,
00079                     Down    = 6,
00081                     Center  = 8
00082                 };
00083 
00085                 enum State {
00087                     Off         = 0,
00090                     Disabled    = 1,
00092                     Enabled     = 2
00093                 };
00094 
00095                 NavigationGuidance();
00096                 NavigationGuidance(State left_state,
00097                                    State right_state = Off,
00098                                    State up_state = Off,
00099                                    State down_state = Off,
00100                                    State center_state = Off);
00101                 ~NavigationGuidance();
00102 
00104                 void SetState(Type type, State state);
00105 
00107                 State GetState(Type type) const;
00108 
00111                 void Merge(NavigationGuidance nav_guid);
00112                 
00113                 BOOLEAN operator == (NavigationGuidance nav_guid) const { return nav_guid.m_value == m_value; }
00114                 BOOLEAN operator != (NavigationGuidance nav_guid) const { return nav_guid.m_value != m_value; }
00115 
00116             private:
00117                 UINT16 m_value;
00118         };
00119
